name: Blackpool Tower
description: Historic landmark offering panoramic views, circus, ballroom, and attractions.

name: Blackpool Pleasure Beach
description: Famous amusement park with rides and shows for all ages.
opening_hours: Open daily from March to end November (times vary) :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}
entry_price: From ~£35 for individual eTicket when booked early :contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3}

name: Sandcastle Waterpark
description: Indoor tropical waterpark perfect for family fun and relaxation.
opening_hours: Session times vary; entry is for a 3-hour session. :contentReference[oaicite:4]{index=4}

name: SEA LIFE Blackpool
description: Aquarium featuring marine creatures and underwater tunnels.
entry_price: Save ~10% by booking online with timed-entry. :contentReference[oaicite:6]{index=6}

name: Stanley Park
description: Beautiful park with boating lake, gardens, and sports facilities.

name: Madame Tussauds Blackpool
description: Wax museum where you can meet celebrity figures in themed zones.
entry_price: Varies; check website for current offers. :contentReference[oaicite:9]{index=9}

name: Blackpool Zoo
description: Award-winning zoo with more than 1,000 animals in scenic grounds.
opening_hours: Opens daily from 10:00; closing time varies by season. :contentReference[oaicite:10]{index=10}
entry_price: Varies; check online for current rates.

name: Central Pier
description: Classic Victorian pier offering amusements, rides and seaside fun.
opening_hours: Open seasonally (March-Nov) though some sections may vary. :contentReference[oaicite:11]{index=11}
entry_price: Free entry to pier itself; rides & arcades extra.

name: North Pier
description: The oldest of Blackpool’s three piers, featuring Victorian entertainment and views.

name: Coral Island
description: Large free-admission indoor amusement arcade with rides, games and eateries.

name: South Pier
description: Seaside pier with thrill rides, family amusements and beachfront views.

name: The Blackpool Tower Ballroom
description: Historic dance hall inside the Tower known for its ornate interior and tea dances.
opening_hours: Times vary by event; part of Tower complex. :contentReference[oaicite:15]{index=15}
